author: wn.com
title: Hitlin Awarded Prestigious Prize for Particle Physics (California Institute of Technology)
text: ( Source : California Institute of Technology ) Professor of Physics David Hitlin has been awarded the 2016 W.K. H. Panofsky Prize in Experimental Particle Physics from the American Physical Society . The $10, 000 prize, established in 1985 , is
